pattern_sources.author: Laura Nelkin
pattern_sources.name: Nelkin Designs
pattern_sources.notes:
From lace, to knitted jewelry with beads, to sweaters, socks and children's garments... Laura's patterns will teach you new techniques with well written, concise directions.  All patterns are tech edited and test knitted.  Many of them include video tutorials for the tricksy bits!

Like Laura’s designs and interested in her clubs? [**Sign up to receive email updates**][1] so you don’t miss out on tutorials, new patterns and kits, and subscriber-only special offers! PLUS new subscribers get a coupon code for 15% off all of my independently published patterns when you sign up!

I have two SUPER FUN clubs! One, [**Lola’s Choice**][2] is all about smaller projects (and has on-going sign-ups) and the other [**The N Club**][3] has larger projects and only has sign ups open once a year.

Any questions about my designs? Please **[check out my Ravelry group][4]**… it is awesome, and helpful, and fun! If you want to keep up with what I am doing you can follow my blog AND sign up for my mailing list!

And finally.... **[need a kit?][5]** 


  [1]: http://www.nelkindesigns.com/mailinglist
  [2]: http://www.nelkindesigns.com/lola
  [3]: http://www.nelkindesigns.com/nclub
  [4]: http://www.nelkindesigns.com/ravelry
  [5]: http://www.nelkindesigns.com/kits

pattern_sources.author: Laura Nelkin
pattern_sources.name: Lola's Choice
pattern_sources.notes:
Lola's Choice is a super fun bi-monthly kit club... 'cause who doesn't love getting crafty mail?

[Sign up here!!!!][1]

Lola is my spicy alter ego…and she knits too!  She is high energy and demanded a knitted kit club all to her own.  And we all know the saying…whatever Lola wants, Lola gets. 
Lola’s Choice is all about smaller fun knits.  These projects are designed to bring you joy, teach you a bit, and give you a sense of accomplishment. Best of all, they’ll be fun to make AND wear!

Lola LOVES yarn, and chooses bases from her favorite dyers and finds new yarns on her travels. She consistently comes up with some pretty awesome combinations (if I do say so myself).  I know you’ll really enjoy these unique projects. 

When you sign up for Lola’s Choice, you’ll be shipped your kit on schedule. Lola is timely! You have plenty of choices with Lola’s Choice– a 1 Kit auto-renew, 3 Kit, or 6 Kit options!


  [1]: http://www.nelkindesigns.com/lola
  [2]: http://www.nelkindesigns.com/lola

pattern_sources.author: j-kolette beckert
pattern_sources.keywords: jkolettebeckert's Ravelry Store, jkbeckert, j kolette beckert
pattern_sources.name: j-kolette beckert's Ravelry Store
pattern_sources.notes:
Thank you for visiting my store.  

My Ravelry name is j-kolette and I love the structural elements of knitting.  I have always liked to explore new ideas and learn new ways people do things as well as historical techniques. Most of my designs look more difficult than they are so I would love to see you try them.

pattern_sources.author: Patrick Hassel-Zein
pattern_sources.name: Rússneskt hekl hversdags og spari
pattern_sources.notes:
> The book is also available in Swedish:
> "[Krokning till vardags och fest][1]".
>
> English translations of all
> patterns are for sale here on Ravelry.
> There is also the English e-book
> "[Tunisian Crochet for Leisure and Pleasure][2]".

This is my second book on Tunisian crochet, containing 30 patterns (plus variations) with signs of inspiration from Nordic traditions, scifi, fantasy and fairytales.

The educational chapter presents both the basics (e.g. Tunisian simple stitch, Tunisian purled stich, Tunisian crochet in the round) as well as new and improved techniques and stitches (e.g. clusters, entrelac, cables and patterns with pearls).

Some patterns are for beginners, and some are for the more experienced crocheter. Among the patterns are 7 new sweaters in both lighter and thicker wool, 12 elegant shawls/scarves/cowls, a cocktail dress, socks, hats, mittens and more. The patterns are written in sizes 2-14 years and XS-4X, for men, women and children.

The book can be ordered from the author.

>**Don't miss out on my fan group: [Inspired by Iceland][3]**


  [1]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/krokning-till-vardags-och-fest
  [2]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/tunisian-crochet-for-leisure-and-pleasure
  [3]: http://www.ravelry.com/groups/inspired-by-iceland

pattern_sources.author: Patrick Hassel-Zein
pattern_sources.name: Krokning till vardags och fest
pattern_sources.notes:
> This book is also available in 
> Icelandic: "[Rússneskt hekl
> hversdags og spari][1]".
> 
> English translations of all
> patterns are for sale here on Ravelry.
> There is also the English e-book
> "[Tunisian Crochet for Leisure and Pleasure][2]".

Krokning är en lite bortglömt typ av textilhantverk. Denna bok ger en detaljerad och omfattande kurs i krokning för både rena nybörjare och mer erfarna hantverkare. Bland annat presenteras knut- färg-, lapptäcks-, hål-, pärl- och flätmönster. Boken ger även 30 mönster till presentartiklar och kläder för alla årstider, män och kvinnor, unga och gamla.

Patrick Hassel-Zein gav ut sin första bok om krokning sommaren 2010. Sedan dess har han utvecklat sin teknik, tagit fram nya och spännande mönster och hållit ett otal krokningskurser både på Island och i Sverige. Våren 2011 nominerade Crochet Liberation Front honom i två kategorier av Flamie-awards: ”Best New Crochet Designer” respektive ”Best Crochet Designer for Men’s Wear”.

Boken kan beställas från författaren.

Det finns ett [litet tryckfel på sida 14][3].

>**Missa inte min fan-grupp: [Inspired by Iceland][4]**


  [1]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/russneskt-hekl-hversdags-og-spari
  [2]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/tunisian-crochet-for-leisure-and-pleasure
  [3]: http://zein.se/design/book2sv.html
  [4]: http://www.ravelry.com/groups/inspired-by-iceland

pattern_sources.author: Patrick Hassel-Zein
pattern_sources.name: Tunisian Crochet for Leisure and Pleasure
pattern_sources.notes:
**### READ THIS! ###**

The book "Tunisian Crochet for Leisure and Pleasure" has not been bublished in a printed English version, but this bundle contains English translations of all patterns from the book. There are also instructions for special stitches, techniques and patterns.

The book contains 30 patterns (plus variations) with signs of inspiration from Nordic traditions, scifi, fantasy and fairytales.

Some patterns are for beginners, and some are for the more experienced crocheter. Among the patterns are 7 new sweaters in both lighter and thicker wool, 12 elegant shawls/scarves/cowls, a cocktail dress, socks, hats, mittens and more. The patterns are written in sizes 2-14 years and XS-4X, for men, women and children.

This e-book contains:

*  All 30 patterns from the book.
*  Instructions for Tunisian crochet in the round (including an extra pattern for fingerless mittens).
*  Instructions for lace patterns in Tunisian crochet.
*  Instructions for entrelac in Tunisian crochet.
*  Instructions for cables in Tunisian crochet.
*  Instruction photos for left-handed crocheters.

For Swedish speaking readers there are also Swedish versions of a few of the above mentioned patterns:

* Autumn Leaves Shawl
* Norther Lights Shawl
* Robin's Hood
* Romeo & Juliet
* Winter Roses Coat
* The Coctail Dress Wilma

>**Don't miss out on my fan group: [Inspired by Iceland][1]**

  [1]: http://www.ravelry.com/groups/inspired-by-iceland

**Message aux francophones:** Si l'anglais n'est pas votre premiere langue, mais que vous souhaitez vous lancer et tricoter un de mes designs, n'hesitez pas ! Je peux vous aider a traduire des passages qui vous poseraient probleme, et, si il y a une demande suffisante, me lancer dans la traduction complete de mes modeles. --Aurelie

pattern_sources.author: Sarah M. Goodwin
pattern_sources.name: Flock of Socks
pattern_sources.notes:
Flock of Socks is an e-book collection of 5 sock patterns for the discounted price of $20.00. 
You will receive individual PDF's for each pattern: Instant Winter Socks (toe up), Instant Winter Socks (cuff down), Slate Pool Socks (toe up), Slate Pool Socks (cuff down), Hematite Lace Socks, and Wave Path Socks.
